typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		nameId as string,
		Name as string,
		Country as string,
		DepId as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 filter(equals(DepId,'d003')) ~> Filter1
Filter1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['EmployeeDep3.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1
